title: Japanese Curry
instructions: Brown chicken in oil. Add onions, garlic, ginger, and cook until soft. Add potatoes and carrots. Pour in water and bring to boil. Simmer until vegetables are tender. Stir in curry roux and grated apple. Simmer until thick.
description: A comforting Japanese curry with tender meat and vegetables in a sweet-savory sauce.

title: Vegetarian Chilli
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and capsicum. Add beans, tomatoes, corn, and spices. Simmer until thickened. Adjust seasoning to taste. Serve with rice or tortilla chips.
description: A bold and smoky chilli packed with beans and vegetables.

title: Duck Ragu with Parmesan Gnocchi
instructions: Slow-cook duck legs with vegetables, tomato paste, red wine, and stock until tender. Shred meat. Make gnocchi by combining mashed potatoes, flour, egg, and parmesan. Boil gnocchi, then serve with the rich duck ragu.
description: A hearty slow-cooked duck ragu served over soft parmesan gnocchi.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions:
Cook spaghetti
Fry bacon
Mix eggs and parmesan
Combine all with pasta off heat to avoid scrambling eggs

title: Veggie Tacos
instructions:
Warm tortillas
Prepare veggie filling with beans, avocado, tomato
Assemble tacos

title: Chicken Curry
instructions:
Sauté onions and garlic
Add chicken and curry powder
Simmer with coconut milk until cooked

title: Quinoa Salad
instructions:
Cook quinoa
Chop veggies
Mix all with olive oil and lemon juice

title: Beef Stroganoff
instructions:
Cook beef and onions
Add mushrooms and sour cream
Simmer until sauce thickens

title: Pancakes
instructions:
Mix ingredients
Pour batter on griddle
Cook until golden brown on both sides
